The 14-Day Body Sculpting Workout for Men drives your body hard in two-week increments so the workout never stays the same for long and the resultsÃ¢â‚¬â€œwashboard abs, a chiseled chest, big guns, broad shoulders, and tight bunsÃ¢â‚¬â€œjust keep on coming. 

The Body Sculpting Bible for Men, Revised Edition is the gold standard for body sculpting. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s everything you've ever wanted in a fitness book and everything you've ever wanted in a training regimenÃ¢â‚¬â€œand it will give you everything you've ever wanted in a body.


About the Author
James Villepigue is an ACE/ISSA/CSCS Certified Personal Trainer, Life/Success Coach & former strength & conditioning coach for the US Karate Team - He has been active in health and fitness for over 17 years. He lives in the New York City area.

Hugo A. Rivera is an ISSA Certified Personal Trainer and fitness expert with fifteen years of bodybuilding experience. He now resides in Clearwater, Florida.
